alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant; Gray; Haskell; Kearny; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 10:54PM CDT until July 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Scott County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lakin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Deerfield around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Plymell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Grant; Gray; Haskell; Kearny; Scott
